<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2405</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reflection and Refraction of light under varying conditions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reflexion und Brechung des Lichtes unter 
unterschiedlichen Bedingungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réflexion et réfraction de lumière dans des 
conditions variables</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reflexão e refraction da luz sob circunstâncias 
variando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riflessione e rifrazione di luce nelle circostanze
di variazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντανάκλαση και διάθλαση του φωτός υπό τους ποικίλους
όρους</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reflexión y refracción de la luz bajo 
condiciones que varían</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A simulation which illustrates the refraction and reflection of light and the relationship between the Intensity of reflected light and the index of refraction</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">physics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">optics</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Simulation, die die Brechung und die 
Reflexion des Lichtes und das Verhältnis zwischen der Intensität des
reflektierten Lichtes und dem Brechungskoeffizienten veranschaulicht</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une simulation qui illustre la réfraction et la 
réflexion de la lumière et le rapport entre l'intensité de la 
lumière réfléchie et l'indice de réfraction</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma simulação que ilustre o refraction e a 
reflexão da luz e o relacionamento entre a intensidade da luz 
refletida e o deslocamento predeterminado de refraction</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una simulazione che illustra la rifrazione e la 
riflessione di luce ed il rapporto fra l'intensità di luce riflessa e
l'indice di rifrazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια προσομοίωση που επεξηγεί τη διάθλαση και την 
αντανάκλαση του φωτός και τη σχέση μεταξύ της έντασης του 
απεικονισμένου φωτός και του ευρετηρίου της διάθλασης</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una simulación que ilustra la refracción y la 
reflexión de la luz y el lazo entre la intensidad de la luz reflejada
e índice de refracción</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Physik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Optik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lumière</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">systeme optique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">física</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">luz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema ótico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">fisica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">luce</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ottica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
